page.title: 17A DAY IN OLIVER'S LIFE
page.content: In the morning I get up at 6:00 and go for a jog.Then I have my breakfast of cornflakes,toast with jam and a cup of coffee. Then it is time for school my mum takes me in our Mazda car. The first lesson is maths then we have English. I like swimming and playing on the adventure playground.After playtime we might have reading then at 12:oo we have lunch in the hall but if it is sunny we go on the field .In the afternoon we do drawing or stories then we have games or swimming and soon it is time to go home.I watch telly and play games like football, kick the can, rounders or go on our wooden climbing frame. My favourite programmes are Knight Rider and no.73 and usally go to bed at 8:00. by Oliver Coquelin aged 9years.
